text: Luiz Alberto Dias Menezes (5 October 1950 - 9 July 2014) was a Brazilian geologist, mineralogist and mineral dealer. He collected the material which was used in the discovery of the mineral menezesite, which was named in his honor. He was born in São Paulo. Menezes died on 9 July 2014 in São Paulo, aged 63. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1950 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Scientists from São Paulo Category:Mineralogists
title: Luiz Alberto Dias Menezes
